State Roads Commission. -4- October 15, 1938.

Potomac River Bridge





Length v
Abutment to abutment.............. ... .. ..., 9919 feet
Maryland approach...........c..uiuiniuunnannn 1528
Total Length.............. EETZZ; feet
Width ‘
Roadway between curbs...................... 24 feet
Emergency walkways, 2 @ 1 foot 6 inches.... 3
Radlings, & @ L FO00B 5. e mmompawess cmsoss 2
Total Width............... 29 feet
Channel Span
Lateral CLEaTaNCE . « «ccmviwvww s ww s os smevins 700 feet
Maximum vertical clearance................. 135
Maximum water depth........................ 76

Maximum depth water surface to hard pan about 190

Substructure

Concrete piers and abutments on steel -and concrete piles
with wrought iron bands at water line.

Superstructure

Structural grade and silicon steel cantilever type A main
span, type C river approach spans, simple truss, simple
girder and simple beam approach spans.

Roadway
Steel open grid type filled with concrete.

Gross Revenue from Tolls

Average for first five years of operation, from 1941 to
1945, $141,000.



Maintenance and Operation Expenses

Maintenance and operation expenses applicable to the Potomac
River Bridge alone—$41,000 per annum,



Total Estimated Cost of Bridge and Maryland Approach Exclus-
ive of Interest During Construction and Bond Discount....$4,112,000
